document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Bauble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">preferred </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Bees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Butterflies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">admired </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Heavenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Hopeless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Distances </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">justified </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Bird </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Noon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">enamel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Herself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Score </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">knew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">Universe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">created </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: This bauble was preferred of bees
